comments.author: jen
comments.content: keep the photos coming! they are lovely and edible.

comments.author: Jim
comments.content: What is it with fried zucchini blossoms? First I see them on Sassy Radish, now they're here. I've gotta get some of those things.

comments.author: S
comments.content: You forgot to mention the kiddos pasta.  She loved the purple flowers in her noodles!  She also had the best ice cream of her life.  Quite an amazing place to have such outstanding cuisine and be so comfortable with a two year old.  I can't wait to go back.
